dialogue: It will be good I am sure.
My contract here will be over soon... and I am thinking of not renewing it.
Oh... you too are going to be leaving us then... Where do you plan to go?
I was thinking...somewhere close to home.
That might be a good idea.
It was nice here, in Bombay. But difficult... And I have a problem with the language too...
You will pick up Hindi... It is not so hard...
I never got used to it here... Even today, after so many months, I forgot to get off at my train station... I reached all the way to the end of the line....
Prabha... I... before I go I wanted to ask you... I wanted to see if... there was a reason if... If I should continue to stay here....If there was some reason for me to stay back.
Nowhere... To the end of the line. Where the last tip of Bombay meets the sea.
I should go... To see it then?
Yes... I think you will like it... Just keep sitting on the bus and don't get off till you reach the end of the line.
